    • getRepresentationOfStudentDisc

      public static String getRepresentationOfStudentDisc(int studentId) throws IllegalStudentIdException
      Gets the String which represents a student disc. The string contains the ANSI codes for the color of the student disc. The student disc is represented as follows: "o".
      Parameters:
      studentId - the id of the student disc
      Returns:
      the String which represents the student disc
      Throws:
      IllegalStudentIdException - if the id of the student disc is invalid

    • getRepresentationOfProfessorPawn

      public static String getRepresentationOfProfessorPawn(int professorId) throws IllegalProfessorIdException
      Gets the String which represents a professor pawn. The string contains the ANSI codes for the color of the professor pawn. The professor pawn is represented as follows: "P".
      Parameters:
      professorId - the id of the professor pawn
      Returns:
      the String which represents the professor pawn
      Throws:
      IllegalProfessorIdException - if the id of the professor pawn is invalid

    • getRepresentationOfTower

      public static String getRepresentationOfTower(ClientTowerColor clientTowerColor) throws TowerNotSetException
      Gets the String which represents a tower. The string contains the ANSI codes for the color of the tower. The tower is represented as follows: "T".
      Parameters:
      clientTowerColor - the color of the tower
      Returns:
      the String which represents the tower
      Throws:
      TowerNotSetException - if the tower has not been set

    • emptySectionWithPawnsOrTowers

      public static void emptySectionWithPawnsOrTowers(String[][] template, int startingIndexLength, int startingIndexHeight, int heightOfSection, int lengthOfSection, int choice)
      Empties a section of the school board which contains pawns or towers starting from (startingIndexHeight, startingIndexLength).
      Parameters:
      template - the matrix containing the school boards
      startingIndexLength - the starting length
      startingIndexHeight - the starting height
      heightOfSection - the height of the section that must be cleared
      lengthOfSection - the length of the section that must be cleared
      choice - an integer which tells the method if it has to clear a section with pawns (0), towers (1) or professor pawns(2)
